name: Persian Lights
description:
<-- GAME GUIDE-->
* change lane by DIRECTIONALS or WASD
* change wall by SHIFT + DIRECTIONAL/WASD

This is for the Unity Learn Jam! 

in this game I, lazy and useless as I am, couldn't come up with cool sfx and graphical stuff to make it stand out. so instead I started working on the game design and lighting/particles. 

In this game you're guaranteed to have some 5-10 minutes of FUN with Persian style lightings :D
